price: 40. Qofkiise ka cabsada hor istaagga Rabbigi, oo ka reeba nafta hawa raaca.
arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِۦ وَنَهَى ٱلنَّفۡسَ عَنِ ٱلۡهَوَىٰ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā man khāfa maqāma rabbihi wanahā al-nafsa ʿani al-hawā
